comment._content: It's been a long time since I lived in Richmond, so I don't recall the name of the low-lying apartment complex on the right hand side.  The large, white street beyond those apartments is Bellemede Road.

comment._content: lol they are the Bellemede apartments ..I lived there when I joined the army in 1967.
